Uses of Package
opennlp.ccg.ngrams

Packages that use opennlp.ccg.ngrams
opennlp.ccg.ngrams   
opennlp.ccg.parse.postagger.ml   
opennlp.ccg.parse.supertagger.ml   
opennlp.ccg.parse.tagger.sequencescoring   
opennlp.ccg.synsem   
 

Classes in opennlp.ccg.ngrams used by opennlp.ccg.ngrams
FactoredNgramModel
          A scorer for a factored n-gram backoff model.
FactoredNgramModel.ModelVariable
          A variable in a factored n-gram model.
FactoredNgramModelFamily
          A scorer consisting of a family of factored n-gram backoff models.
FactoredNgramModelFamily.ModelGroup
          A factored n-gram model and any secondary ones for the same child variable.
NgramFilter
          Interface for objects that filter unhappy n-grams.
NgramScorer
          Super class for n-gram scoring models.
NgramScorer.NgramFloats
          An ngram data object, for holding the log prob and backoff weight.
Reversible
          Interface for reversible n-gram classes.
SelfParaphraseBiaser
          Interface for scoring models that implement a self-paraphrase bias.
SRILM_ScorerMaker
          A custom scorer maker that builds and loads standard n-gram models using the SRILM toolkit, which must be separately installed.
SRILMNgramModelType
          Used by SRILMNgramModel to specify the type of language model that should be used.
 

Classes in opennlp.ccg.ngrams used by opennlp.ccg.parse.postagger.ml
ConditionalProbabilityTable
          A conditional probability table implemented via a FactoredNgramModelFamily, where probabilities are determined by n-grams of "factors" of a single "word" (whether the pairs of attributes and values have anything to do with words or not).
 

Classes in opennlp.ccg.ngrams used by opennlp.ccg.parse.supertagger.ml
ConditionalProbabilityTable
          A conditional probability table implemented via a FactoredNgramModelFamily, where probabilities are determined by n-grams of "factors" of a single "word" (whether the pairs of attributes and values have anything to do with words or not).
 

Classes in opennlp.ccg.ngrams used by opennlp.ccg.parse.tagger.sequencescoring
NgramScorer
          Super class for n-gram scoring models.
Reversible
          Interface for reversible n-gram classes.
StandardNgramModel
          A scorer for a standard n-gram backoff model.
 

Classes in opennlp.ccg.ngrams used by opennlp.ccg.synsem
ConditionalProbabilityTable
          A conditional probability table implemented via a FactoredNgramModelFamily, where probabilities are determined by n-grams of "factors" of a single "word" (whether the pairs of attributes and values have anything to do with words or not).
